name: Cosmopolitan
description: A sophisticated cocktail that gained popularity in the 1990s through the TV show 'Sex and the City'. This elegant pink drink combines vodka, cranberry juice, lime, and orange liqueur for a perfect balance of sweet, tart, and citrus flavors.

attributes.value: Citrus Vodka, Triple Sec, Cranberry Juice, Lime Juice
Add 1.5 oz citrus vodka, 1 oz cranberry juice, 0.5 oz fresh lime juice, and 0.5 oz triple sec to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds. Double strain into a chilled martini glass
